definition: aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale

sentences.english: An international investigation said a North Korean torpedo sank the ship.
sentences.chinese: 一項國際調查顯示朝鮮的魚雷炸沉了天安艦。

sentences.english: Seoul and Washington have blamed the sinking of the Cheonan on the North.
sentences.chinese: 韓國和美國都將天安艦事件歸咎於朝鮮方面。

sentences.english: South Korea was outraged by the incident.
sentences.chinese: 天安艦事件激怒了整個韓國。

sentences.english: Thellos merchant shellop was convoyed by a destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 這艘運載貨物的船由一擯除艦護航。

sentences.english: Fred had no intention of engaging in ship-to-ship combat.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德沒有興趣進行一場艦對艦格鬥。

sentences.english: Fred had no intention of engaging in ship-to-ship combat.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德沒有興趣進行一場艦對艦格鬥。

sentences.english: The shapes Shemsen watched were wrong for surface ships or fliers .
sentences.chinese: 舍姆森看到的部隊外形並非是水面艦或者快艇。

sentences.english: Two piers down, a Volantene river galley was discharging soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 再過兩個碼頭，有艘瓦蘭提斯河艦正在卸下士兵們。

sentences.english: Chinese aircraft carrier, the Liaoning, has anchored for the first time in its military port in Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 中國航空母艦遼寧艦首次靠泊青島某軍港。

sentences.english: The ship became heavier, its speed decreased.
sentences.chinese: 艦變得較重，其速度就下降了。

sentences.english: North Korea must first day the ship sank and taeyonpyong shelling incident.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮首先要對天安艦沉沒和延坪島炮擊事件負責。

sentences.english: Chinese anti-smuggling ship detained a Taiwanese fishing vessel.
sentences.chinese: 大陸緝私艦扣押臺籍漁船。

sentences.english: Its sister, the Admiral Kuznetsov, is the flagship of Russia’s navy.
sentences.chinese: 它的姊妹艦“庫茲涅佐夫”號現在已經是俄海軍旗艦。

sentences.english: One of the most dangerous stages is landing.
sentences.chinese: 其外最安險的階段便非上滑滅艦。

sentences.english: Forty-six sailors died in the Cheonan tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 當時，有46名水手死於“天安艦”。
